translation.en: - Well, I don't think that's very-- - Just go!
translation.es: - No creo que eso sea muy... - ¡Vete!

translation.en: This is higher than I thought.
translation.es: Es más alto de lo que pensé.

translation.en: Hey. Do you have plans this weekend? My parents are gonna be out of town.
translation.es: Oye, ¿tienes planes para el fin de semana? Mis padres no estarán.

translation.en: I was thinking about having a party or something.
Everything is a really big word.
- Let's start with-- - Do you mean physically?
Emotionally? Those both could encompass everything.
translation.es: ¿Emocionalmente? Ambas cosas son parte de todo.

translation.en: Or is everything encompassed by both things?
Are you feeling overwhelmed by anything?
If everything is encompassed by both things,
translation.es: Y si está abarcado por ambas,

translation.en: are they a part of our reality, or are they somewhere else?
translation.es: ¿son parte de nuestra realidad o están en otro lado?

translation.en: I need you to take these meetings seriously.
translation.es: Necesito que tomes en serio estas reuniones.

translation.en: OK, do you get that you're on probation,
translation.es: ¿Entiendes que estás en un período de prueba?

translation.en: and in danger of not graduating?
translation.es: ¿Y que estás en peligro de no graduarte?

translation.en: You've already missed two weeks of school this year.
translation.es: Ya perdiste dos semanas de clases este año.

translation.en: I just wanna clarify real quickly.
Is this the grandma who's died four times over the past three years?
translation.es: ¿Es la abuela que murió cuatro veces en los últimos tres años?

translation.en: I really wanna help you, but you've gotta take this seriously.
translation.es: Realmente quiero ayudarte, pero debes tomar esto en serio.

translation.en: I mean, you agreed to these terms, these weekly counseling sessions,
translation.es: Tú aceptaste estos términos, estas sesiones semanales de terapia,

translation.en: maintaining a B- average, extracurricular participation.
translation.es: mantener un promedio de B y actividades extracurriculares.

translation.en: If I screw anything up, I'm out.
We're not askin' a lot of you, Finch.
translation.es: No pedimos mucho de ti, Finch.

translation.en: You just need to show up.
My parents are pissed because I missed early admissions,
translation.es: Mis padres están enojados porque me anoté tarde a las universidades.

translation.en: but it's not like that matters, anyway.
translation.es: Mis padres están enojados porque me anoté tarde a las universidades. Ni que importara.

translation.en: I mean, I know I'm gonna get in.
So, you going to Amanda's party?
It couldn't hurt to have a little fun, right?
Yo, do you think it'd be weird if I named my kid after a famous person?
translation.es: ¿Crees que sería raro si nombro a mi hijo como una persona famosa?

translation.en: Like, if I named him Danny DeVito Donahue,
translation.es: Si lo nombro Danny DeVito Donahue,

translation.en: do you... do you think he'd be mad about it?
Follow- up question: how high are you right now?
On the scale, I'd probably say very... this way.
translation.es: En la escala... Yo diría que mucho.

translation.en: Just admiring the social norms of teenage angst.
translation.es: Solo admiro las normas sociales de la angustia adolescente.

translation.en: - Are you looking at Violet Markey? - Yep.
Why ask about her all of a sudden?
I'm intrigued. A guy can't be intrigued?
Well, a guy can be intrigued. You being intrigued is weird.
translation.es: Cualquiera puede preguntar. Que tú lo hagas es raro.

translation.en: - Definitely weird. - No, I don't think it's weird.
translation.es: - Muy raro. - No creo que sea raro.

translation.en: Wait, if you don't think you're weird, well...
translation.es: Si no crees que eres raro...

translation.en: - Yeah, that's true. Very true. - She has a point.
translation.es: - Sí, es verdad. Es cierto. - Sí, tiene razón.

translation.en: His name's Embry. I call him Embryo. It's the little things, Kate.
translation.es: Se llama Embry. Lo llamo Embrión. Son las pequeñas cosas, Kate.

translation.en: Did you do something I should be worried about?
I'm genuinely offended by that supposition.
It's fine. I'll deal with it.
- I hate when you say that. - Why?
Because what you really mean is that I'm gonna have to deal with it.
translation.es: Porque significa que yo lidiaré con eso.

translation.en: just go hang out with Tina or whatever it is you do.
translation.es: Ve con Tina o lo que sea que haces.

translation.en: OK. I'm gonna be home late. There's food in the fridge.
translation.es: Bien. Llegaré tarde a casa. Hay comida en el refrigerador.

translation.en: She had to go to Chicago for business. Remember?
translation.es: Se fue a Chicago por negocios. ¿Recuerdas?

translation.en: - Oh, yeah, right. Cool. - Love you.
Your mother and I know that today couldn't have been easy.
translation.es: Tu madre y yo sabemos que hoy no pudo haber sido fácil.

translation.en: And it wasn't easy for us either.
translation.es: Y tampoco fue fácil para nosotros.

translation.en: - If you need to talk about it-- -
I thought this would be nice.
I've been making it for 19 years.
As some of you will be graduating and leaving us at the end of the year,
translation.es: Como algunos de ustedes se graduarán y se irán a fin de año,

translation.en: I feel an obligation to make sure you see the wondrous sights of Indiana
translation.es: siento la obligación de asegurarme de que vean las maravillas de Indiana

translation.en: To wander them, if you will.
For your class project, you must report on two or more wonders of Indiana.
translation.es: Para el proyecto deben hablar sobre dos o más maravillas de Indiana.

translation.en: explain their significance to you and to Indiana,
translation.es: sobre su significado para ustedes y para Indiana,

translation.en: and why you chose to visit them.
I want you to take time on this assignment.
- What? - All right, settle. Violet, are you OK?
All right, let's take our seats. Let's focus up.
Yes, I am done, and can I just say you are doing a fine job teaching this class.
translation.es: Sí. Y quiero decir que estás haciendo un trabajo fantástico como profesor.

translation.en: My young brain is plump with knowledge.
translation.es: Mi joven cerebro está lleno de conocimiento.

translation.en: - Thank you, Mr. Finch. - You're welcome.
As I was saying,  you'll be taking photos, doing some drawings, capturing detail.
translation.es: Como decía, tomarán fotos, harán dibujos, captarán detalles.

translation.en: You will be doing this in teams of two.
translation.es: Lo harán en equipos de a dos.

translation.en: do you think that there's such a thing as a perfect day?
I'm the last person you should be asking.
this teacher wants us to do this project with a partner,
translation.es: nos pidieron que hagamos un proyecto con un compañero,

translation.en: and I just don't wanna do it.
Well, did you ask for an alternate project?
Yeah, he just... he wouldn't listen.
Well, maybe it's time to get back out there.
translation.es: Quizá sea hora de volver al mundo.

translation.en: That's the same thing he said.
- But you just don't go out anymore. - That's not true.
translation.es: - Pero ya no sales más. - Eso no es cierto.

translation.en: When's the last time you hung out with your friends?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo fue la última vez que saliste con tus amigos?

translation.en: I think it would be really good if you'd spend some time with them.
translation.es: Creo que sería muy bueno que pasaras tiempo con ellos.

translation.en: So, if I hung out with my friends, you'd get me outta this assignment?
translation.es: Si salgo con mis amigos, ¿me quitarías esta tarea?

translation.en: - I'm gonna get a drink. Do you want one? - I'm good.
translation.es: - Iré por un trago. ¿Quieres uno? - Estoy bien.

translation.en: You know me. I love to rage.
translation.es: Ya me conoces, me encantan las fiestas.

translation.en: So, you wanna go out back? Talk a little?
translation.es: Ya me conoces, me encantan las fiestas. ¿Quieres salir? ¿Hablar un poco?

translation.en: I think I'm gonna leave pretty soon, actually.
Really? But... I mean, I just got here.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Pero yo acabo de llegar.

translation.en: It's just all a little much, you know?
How much longer are you gonna act like this?
It's been months. When are you gonna just...
Violet, you know I didn't mean it like that. Just...
translation.es: Violet, sabes que no quise decir eso.

translation.en: Violet Markey, if you're seeing this, you're still alive.
translation.es: Violet Markey, si estás viendo esto, sigues viva.

translation.en: ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa dentro de esa linda cabeza?

translation.en: ♪ I met you standing on a ledge ♪
translation.es: Te conocí cuando estabas en la cornisa

translation.en: ♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
translation.es: ¿Por qué no hablas conmigo en vez?

translation.en: The video will self- destruct in three, two...
translation.es: El video se autodestruirá en tres, dos...

translation.en: I wanna talk about the bridge.
I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times.
translation.es: Siento que no podemos pasar por otro momento terrible.

translation.en: One morning barely qualifies as a terrible time.
translation.es: Una mañana apenas califica como un momento terrible.

translation.en: the website that you have with your sister?
translation.es: ...con esa página web que tienes con tu hermana?

translation.en: I read some of your stuff. It's really good.
translation.es: Leí algunas de tus cosas. Son buenas.

translation.en: So, you moved here from California.
translation.es: Así que te mudaste aquí de California.

translation.en: I didn't know that it happened there.
Whatever you are, I saved your life.
translation.es: Seas lo que seas, te salvé la vida.

translation.en: You're making a big deal out of nothing.
What do you want from me?
I was just thinkin' that we should be partners.
I think it would be good for you to get out.
translation.es: Creo que sería bueno que salieras.

translation.en: Maybe I don't wanna get out.

translation.es: Quizá estoy harta de la gente.

translation.en: But the tiniest few might actually mean well.
translation.es: Pero algunos pocos quizá tengan buenas intenciones.

translation.en: Why do you wanna do this with me, anyway?
Because there are places that need to be seen.
translation.es: Porque hay lugares que hay que ver.

translation.en: Maybe even the smallest of places can mean something.
translation.es: Tal vez hasta el lugar más pequeño pueda significar algo.

translation.en: At the very least, maybe they can mean something to us.
translation.es: O al menos, tal vez signifique algo para nosotros.

translation.en: Maybe they can mean something to you and me.
translation.es: Quizá puedan significar algo para ti y para mí.

translation.en: Jesus, they call me anti- social.
translation.es: Cielos, y me dicen a mí antisocial.

translation.en: We can do more if you end up loving it.
translation.es: Podemos hacer más si vemos que te gusta.

translation.en: Oh, I found another quote for you.
I feel a thousand capacities spring up in me.
translation.es: Siento mil capacidades surgiendo en mí.

translation.en: The Waves. It's from The Waves.
translation.es: Las olas. Es de Las olas.

translation.en: You've got at least a thousand capacities in you.
Even if you don't think so.
You know people call you The Freak, right?
translation.es: Sabes que todos te llaman fenómeno, ¿no?

translation.en: Sometimes I say and do things without thinking, and...
translation.es: A veces digo y hago cosas sin pensar,

translation.en: people don't like that, people like labels.
translation.es: y a la gente no le gusta. Les gusta poner etiquetas,

translation.en: They like putting you in a box.
They want you to be who they want you to be.
translation.es: Quieren que seas quien ellos quieren que seas.
A la gente no le gusta el desorden.

translation.en: My parents are calling Hudson to get me outta the project,
translation.es: Mis padres llamarán a Hudson para sacarme del proyecto.

translation.en: so you need to find another partner.
He feels pretty strongly about participation.
If you wanna do this with me,
you have to figure out another way because I'm not getting in a car.
translation.es: debes buscar otra forma, porque no subiré a un auto.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
translation.es: ¿Adónde irías si pudieras ir a cualquier lado?

translation.en: - California. - But you've already been there.
translation.es: A California. Pero ya has estado ahí.

translation.en: It's warm and it never snows.
Don't you wanna know where I'd go if I could go anywhere?
translation.es: ¿No quieres saber adónde iría yo si pudiera ir a cualquier lado?

translation.en: Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
translation.es: ¿Adónde irías si pudieras ir a cualquier lado?

translation.en: I'd go to a place no one's ever been before.
translation.es: Iría a un lugar donde nadie ha estado antes.

translation.en: You could come... if you want.
Come on. The view is incredible.

translation.es: El punto más alto de Indiana.

translation.en: I think if I were here for literally any other reason than why you and I are here,
translation.es: Si hubiese venido por otra razón que por la que vinimos,

translation.en: Oh, wow. Is that a sense of humor you're hiding in there?
translation.es: Vaya. ¿Es un sentido del humor lo que escondes ahí?

translation.en: This is the lamest thing I think I've ever seen.
translation.es: Es lo más patético que he visto en mi vida.

translation.en: It's OK, you know? You're not going to hell for laughing.
translation.es: Está bien, ¿sabes? No te irás al infierno por reírte.
Era el cumpleaños de mi hermana.

translation.en: That's why I was at the bridge.
translation.es: Por eso estaba en el puente.

translation.en: These are the things we leave behind.
translation.es: Estas son las cosas que dejamos atrás.

translation.en: This is a motherfucking staring contest.
Look at my face. I'm really serious.
translation.es: Mira mi cara. Hablo en serio.

translation.en: I'm staying over at Tina's tonight.
translation.es: Me quedaré en casa de Tina esta noche.

translation.en: - about how Tina's an asshole... - Diatribe. Good word.
translation.es: - sobre cómo Tina es una idiota... - Diatriba es una buena palabra.

translation.en: ...and how I shouldn't spend so much time with her.
translation.es: ...y no debería pasar tanto tiempo con ella.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it appears that my many rantings on this topic
translation.es: Parece que has interiorizado mis comentarios sobre este tema

translation.en: have stuck with you, and I don't have to preach anymore.
translation.es: Parece que has interiorizado mis comentarios sobre este tema y ya no tengo que decirte más nada.

translation.en: I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times.
translation.es: Siento que no podemos pasar por otro momento terrible.

translation.en: Why are women so much more interesting to men
translation.es: ¿Por qué las mujeres son más interesantes para los hombres
que los hombres para las mujeres?.

translation.en: My own brain is, to me, the most unaccountable of machinery,
translation.es: Mi propio cerebro es, para mí, la maquinaria más inexplicable.

translation.en: always buzzing, humming, soaring, roaring, diving,
translation.es: Siempre zumbando, tarareando, volando, rugiendo, buceando

translation.en: If you do not tell the truth about yourself,
translation.es: Si no dices la verdad sobre ti mismo,

translation.en: you cannot tell it about other people.
translation.es: no puedes decirla sobre otras personas.

translation.en: She only liked this Italian poet,
translation.es: Solo le gustaba este poeta italiano,

translation.en: He said, We do not remember days, we remember moments.
translation.es: Dijo: No recordamos días, recordamos momentos.

translation.en: Any time I was having a bad day,
translation.es: Cada vez que tenía un mal día,

translation.en: Like it was supposed to fix something.
translation.es: Como si fuera a arreglar algo.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna have to steal that one from you.
- Wanna flip 'em? - Yeah, are they ready?
- Yeah. Well, give it a-- - Almost ready.
- - There we go. That one's good. - Yeah, there you go. Golden brown -
translation.es: - Eso es. Ese está bien. - Sí, muy bien. Dorados.

translation.en: You're not mad that I'm doing that project with Roamer, right?
translation.es: No te molesta que haga el proyecto con Roamer, ¿no?

translation.en: OK, cool. 'Cause it's, like, it's not a thing.
No, it's fine. I'm doing it with Finch.
translation.es: No, está bien. Yo lo haré con Finch.

translation.en: You know that he's, like, kinda dangerous?
translation.es: Sabes que es un poco peligroso.

translation.en: He freaked out last year and threw a chair at Roamer,
translation.es: Se enojó el año pasado y le tiró una silla a Roamer

translation.en: like, in the middle of class.
Yeah, like, Roamer was fine, but he's seriously fucked up.
translation.es: Sí. No le pasó nada a Roamer, pero él es jodido.

translation.en: So, I was thinking we should check out the Shoe Tree or the abandoned drive- in,
translation.es: Deberíamos ver el árbol de zapatos o el autocine abandonado,

translation.en: That's a reminder that sooner or later,
translation.es: Es un recordatorio de que, tarde o temprano,

translation.en: you're gonna have to get back into the world all by yourself.
translation.es: tendrás que regresar al mundo tú sola.

translation.en: But I'm happy pushing you for now.
translation.es: Pero estoy feliz de empujarte por ahora.

translation.en: Well, I said I was only gonna do two, so...
translation.es: Dije que solo haría dos, así que...

translation.en: I prefer Private Violet to... Public Violet.
translation.es: Prefiero a Violet Privada antes que a Violet Pública.

translation.en: I'll wait.  Maybe you should give her some space.
Nice sweater. What's that, a cotton blend?
People think this whole freak thing is an act. I know it's real.
translation.es: La gente cree que lo tuyo es un acto. Yo sé que es real.

translation.en: Come on. You gotta give me more than that.
People are always telling me what I am.
translation.es: La gente siempre me dice lo que soy.

translation.en: Doesn't mean it doesn't piss me off sometimes.
translation.es: Pero no significa que a veces no me moleste.

translation.en: Come on. Help me out here. Come on. Help me out.
Maybe if... you got a fainting couch,
translation.es: Tal vez, si compras un sofá.

translation.en: you could put it right over there.
It would really give me the mise en scène that I was looking for.
translation.es: Podría darme la mise en scène que estoy buscando.

translation.en: Did you look into that support group I told you to check out?
translation.es: ¿Buscaste al grupo de apoyo que te dije?

translation.en: I might've lost the info on that one.
Come on, Theodore. It's a small ask, man.
All right. It's Mondays after school at First Congregational.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Es los lunes después de clases en First Congregational.

translation.en: - It's called Fresh Approach... - Ooh! ...and it is confidential,
translation.es: Se llama Nuevo Encuentro, y es confidencial,

translation.en: so you can say whatever you want about anything that's bothering you.
translation.es: así que puedes decir lo que quieras sobre cualquier cosa que te moleste.

translation.en: It is a safe space, Finch.
I want you to think about it.
What now? Now what are we doing? What?
- This is off- brand. - Please leave now.
translation.es: - No es de marca. - Por favor, vete.

translation.en: There's a kid on my lawn.
translation.es: Hay un chico en mi jardín.

translation.en: I know you said that you were done,
translation.es: Sé que dijiste que habías terminado,

translation.en: but what if I told you
that I found the best wander in the state of Indiana,
translation.es: que encontré el mejor paseo en el estado de Indiana,

translation.en: I'd say have fun, and I can't wait to hear all about it.
translation.es: Te diría que te diviertas y espero que me cuentes todo.

translation.en: Come on! Just give it a chance.
- At least sit inside. - No, Finch.
I'm not getting in a car!
Look, here. I'll take the keys, and...
I swear not to drive faster than 30 miles per hour through town
translation.es: Prometo no conducir más rápido que 50 km por hora

translation.en: If at any time you wanna stop, we stop.
translation.es: Si en algún momento quieres parar, paramos.
No puedes presionar a la gente.

translation.en: You don't listen. We did it. The project is over. This is over.
translation.es: No escuchas. Lo hicimos. El proyecto terminó. Esto se acabó.

translation.en: You know this isn't about a class assignment.
translation.es: Sabes que esto no se trata de una tarea.

translation.en: This is about you being holed up in your room or on your stupid bike,
translation.es: Se trata de que te escondes en tu cuarto o en tu estúpida bici,

translation.en: always circling the same three- mile radius.
translation.es: siempre en el mismo radio de 5 km.

translation.en: And God forbid anyone risk upsetting Poor Violet, but...
translation.es: Y que nadie se atreva a molestar a la Pobre Violet.

translation.en: Sorry. Hey. Hi, I'm Theodore Finch. Pleasure to meet you both.
translation.es: Lo siento. Hola, soy Theodore Finch. Es un placer.

translation.en: - Little early, don't you think, Theodore? - Yes. Yes, it is early.
translation.es: Es un poco temprano, ¿no? Sí, es temprano.

translation.en: But you see, I'm your daughter's partner for the school project,
translation.es: Soy el compañero de proyecto de su hija

translation.en: and we really need to get to this place.
translation.es: y debemos ir a un lugar.

translation.en: Basically, I need her to get into the car.
translation.es: Y necesito que se suba al auto.

translation.en: with an experienced driver who hasn't gotten so much as a speeding ticket.
translation.es: soy un conductor experimentado que nunca tuvo una multa.

translation.en: This is for a school project?
Well, Theodore, I think it's Violet's decision to make, but...
translation.es: Bueno, Theodore, creo que es decisión de Violet.

translation.en: Hey, your guess is as good as ours.
OK. If I were keys, where would I hide?
translation.es: Bien. Si yo fuera una llave, ¿dónde me escondería?

translation.en: How are we doin' over there?
Just stop asking me. You're making it worse.
translation.es: Deja de preguntarme. Lo estás empeorando.

translation.en: But right now, I got nothin'.
I don't remember how fast we were going.
translation.es: No recuerdo lo rápido que íbamos.

translation.en: and Eleanor was saying, I can't hold on.
translation.es: Y Eleanor dijo: No puedo sujetarme.

translation.en: And then the car slammed into the bridge.
translation.es: Y el auto se estrelló contra el puente.

translation.en: I just remember the... the glass hitting my face
translation.es: Solo recuerdo el vidrio golpeando mi cara

translation.en: Then... after that, it just all goes blank.
translation.es: Después de eso, todo quedó en blanco.

translation.en: When I woke up in the hospital,
my mom told me she was gone.
translation.es: mi mamá me dijo que había muerto.

translation.en: Still mad you got in the car?
- You really built this yourself? - Yes, I did.
- All right. Here we go. - Let's do it.
translation.es: EL FLASH AZUL - Bien. Aquí vamos. - Hagámoslo.

translation.en: - - I'm gonna do it. - - Have a good one.
I can see my house from here.
translation.es: Puedo ver mi casa desde aquí.

translation.en: - Oh, yeah. It's just like the real thing. -
translation.es: Sí. Es igual a la real.

translation.en: All right. Here we go. You ready?
I got you somethin'. It's in the door.
translation.es: Tengo algo para ti. Está en la puerta.

translation.en: That, Ultraviolet, is a special place
translation.es: Eso, Ultravioleta, es un lugar especial

translation.en: that I'm gonna take you to one day.
translation.es: al que te llevaré un día.

translation.en: Yeah, but you're gonna need to start pullin' your weight, OK?
translation.es: Sí, pero tendrás que empezar a hacer tu parte.

translation.en: just in case you've forgotten this is a school project,
translation.es: ESCRÍBEME Por si te olvidaste de que es un proyecto,

translation.en: you have to write about it.
No. You gotta start with Hoosier Hill.
translation.es: No, debes empezar con Hoosier Hill.

translation.en: You know, you don't have to be so pushy.
translation.es: No tienes por qué ser agresivo.

translation.en: You say pushy, and I hear, um... assertive, bold, inspiring.
translation.es: Dices agresivo y yo oigo asertivo, audaz, inspirador.

translation.en: It's nice to have a friend again.
translation.es: Es lindo tener un amigo otra vez.

translation.en: Don't let that go to your head.
translation.es: Que no se te suba a la cabeza.

translation.en: You know what I like about you, Ultraviolet?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué me gusta de ti, Ultravioleta?

translation.en: You're all the colors in one... at full brightness.
translation.es: Eres todos los colores en uno, con todo el brillo.

translation.en: Before we get started, we are nearing D- Day, people.
translation.es: Antes de empezar, nos acercamos al Día D.

translation.en: The day to present your wanderings.
translation.es: El día para presentar sus trabajos.

translation.en: I'm going to be asking each group to do a presentation to the whole class.
translation.es: voy a pedirle a cada grupo que haga una presentación a toda la clase.

translation.en: But today, we're talking about the five themes of geography:
translation.es: Pero hoy hablaremos de los cinco temas de la geografía.

translation.en: No, but honestly, I wouldn't even worry about it.
translation.es: No, pero la verdad, no me preocuparía.

translation.en: - This is just what Finch does. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Esto es lo que hace Finch. - Sí.

translation.en: I've texted him for the past couple days, and he hasn't responded.
translation.es: Hace un par de días que no contesta mis mensajes.

translation.en: ...I mean, sometimes he's gone for a day, like, maybe two, but he always turns up.
translation.es: A veces desaparece por un día, tal vez dos, pero siempre regresa.

translation.en: Yeah, there was that one time that he was gone for like a week.
translation.es: Sí, hubo una vez que se fue por una semana.

translation.en: - Oh, my God. - He came back and said he went camping,
translation.es: - Dios mío. - Regresó y dijo que se fue a acampar.

translation.en: and he had all these poison ivy spots on him...
translation.es: - Dios mío. - Regresó y dijo que se fue a acampar. Tenía manchas de hiedra venenosa, picazón... Sí.

translation.en: - Covered in spots. - ...itching, it was like... yeah.
translation.es: Tenía manchas de hiedra venenosa, picazón... Sí.

translation.en: It was bad. It was so bad.
I think it's pretty fucked up.
It's easy to pick up your phone and respond.
It's... that's just something you have to deal with
translation.es: Es... Es algo con lo que tienes que lidiar si quieres ser cercana a él.

translation.en: if you wanna be close with him, you know?
translation.es: Es algo con lo que tienes que lidiar si quieres ser cercana a él.

translation.en: Yeah. So, we've been to a lot of really interesting places so far.
translation.es: Sí, ya fuimos a muchos lugares interesantes.

translation.en: Do you have an actual plan,
or you've just kind of been shooting from the hip?
translation.es: o simplemente vas con la corriente?

translation.en: Honestly? I'm just trying to distract her into spending as much time with me
translation.es: Intento distraerla para que pase tanto tiempo conmigo

translation.en: And has it been going OK, or--
Yeah, I think so. I've been really...
Did you lose your phone? I've been texting. I've been calling.
translation.es: ¿Perdiste el teléfono? Te escribí. Te llamé.

translation.en: Look, let me just show you this really fast. Hold on.
- You could've taken a second to respond... - I know.
translation.es: - Te lleva un segundo responder. - Lo sé.

translation.en: - ...so I knew you were OK. - I had to take care of a couple things.
translation.es: - Decir que estás bien. - Tenía que encargarme de algo.

translation.en: In the '50s, a group of boys went swimming here,
translation.es: En los años 50, un grupo de chicos vino a nadar aquí

translation.en: No one ever found their bodies.
Or maybe they found the other side.
translation.es: O tal vez encontraron el otro lado.

translation.en: They say there's a force in the middle that sucks you into an underground river
translation.es: Dicen que hay una fuerza en el medio que te succiona a un río subterráneo

translation.en: and leads you to another world.
translation.es: y te lleva a otro mundo.

translation.en: - No, I'm good. - What are you afraid of?
translation.es: - No, estoy bien. - ¿De qué tienes miedo?

translation.en: what are you most afraid of?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que te da más miedo?

translation.en: - Oh, you're right. Fucking freezing! - Oh, my God!
So, what are you most afraid of?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que te da más miedo?

translation.en: I don't know. I guess losing my sister.
translation.es: No lo sé. Supongo que perder a mi hermana.

translation.en: My dad left a while ago. New town, new family.
translation.es: Mi papá se fue hace tiempo. Nueva ciudad, nueva familia.

translation.en: So, Kate's basically all I have.
translation.es: Kate es básicamente lo único que tengo.

translation.en: I'm going in search of the bottom.
Do you know how scared I was?
I didn't... I didn't mean to scare you.
That was the last thing that I wanted to do.
translation.es: Es lo último que quiero hacer.

translation.en: Where do you go when you disappear?
Tell me something real about you.
Sometimes I have to go to places that make me feel like myself.
translation.es: A veces tengo que ir a lugares que me hacen sentir como yo.

translation.en: I need to do things that remind me that I'm in control.
translation.es: Necesito hacer cosas que me recuerden que tengo el control.

translation.en: Did he do that to you?
I used to be a lot smaller.
I used to not know how to get out of the way.
translation.es: No sabía cómo salir de su camino.
A la gente no le gusta lo complicado, ¿no?

translation.en: - Oh, wait. Yeah, you got it. - I know, I had it!
♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
translation.es: ¿Por qué no hablas conmigo en vez?

translation.en: - And then it goes-- - There's the bridge.
- Yeah. No, you got it. - OK.
♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
Finch, wake up. We gotta go.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry. My phone died.
translation.es: Lo siento. Me quedé sin batería.

translation.en: - Finch, just... you should go home. - Don't blame her.
translation.es: Finch, deberías irte a casa. - No la culpen. Puedo explicarlo. - ¡No es su culpa!

translation.en: - If I could explain. Please-- - It's not his fault!
translation.es: - No la culpen. Puedo explicarlo. - ¡No es su culpa!

translation.en: - We'll talk about it later. - I lost track of time.
translation.es: - Hablaremos después. - Se pasó el tiempo.

translation.en: It was my fault. I fucked up.
Please, just don't blame her. Please. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Por favor, no la culpes. Lo siento.

translation.en: what horrible situations we had you in, in our heads?
translation.es: de las situaciones horribles en las que estabas en nuestra cabeza?

translation.en: You have to understand how that felt,
translation.es: Tienes que entender cómo nos sentimos,

translation.en: your dad and I not knowing where you were.
translation.es: tu papá y yo, sin saber dónde estabas.

translation.en: But you didn't have to treat Finch like that.
translation.es: No tenías que tratar así a Finch.

translation.en: Well, he's the boy that kept our daughter out all night.
translation.es: Es el chico que mantuvo a nuestra hija afuera toda la noche.

translation.en: I kept him out all night, too, Mom.
translation.es: Yo también lo mantuve afuera toda la noche.

translation.en: - Fine. - It's been a minute. What's been going on?
I can't deal with you right now.
I'm not tryin' to be an asshole,
but you should know what you're getting into.
translation.es: pero deberías saber en qué te estás metiendo.

translation.en: - Where've you been? - You know why she's hangin' out with you?
You have no idea who he really is, do you? He's a freak!
translation.es: No tienes idea de quién es, ¿no? ¡Es un fenómeno!

translation.en: - Call me a freak one more time. - You're a fuckin' freak.
translation.es: - Llámame así una vez más. - Eres un fenómeno.

translation.en: Finch! Yo, let him go, man. Get off him.
What the hell? He almost killed him.
I've been friends with the guy since minute one,
translation.es: Soy amigo de él desde el principio

translation.en: and I haven't waited for his call in years.
translation.es: y hace años que no espero su llamada.

translation.en: gets in this mood sometimes, and...
translation.es: Se pone de mal humor y...

translation.en: and everybody who gets close to him gets burned out.
translation.es: y todos los que se le acercan se queman.

translation.en: So, why do you stick around?
He thinks everybody leaves him and I won't do that.
translation.es: Él cree que todos lo abandonan y yo no lo haré.

translation.en: I'm gonna get mad, he's gonna come back and apologize,
translation.es: Me voy a enojar, él regresará y se disculpará,

translation.en: and it'll be like it never even happened.
translation.es: y será como si nada hubiera pasado.

translation.en: Um... I'm OCD and just got diagnosed with a social anxiety disorder,
translation.es: Tengo TOC y me acaban de diagnosticar un trastorno de ansiedad social,

translation.en: so being here with everyone is not intimidating at all.
translation.es: así que estar aquí con todos no es para nada intimidante.

translation.en: Last year, I started cutting myself.
translation.es: El año pasado empecé a cortarme.

translation.en: I still deal with it, but I'm here.
translation.es: Aún lo hago, pero estoy aquí.

translation.en: Um... I am ADHD, OCD, BPD, DID, and bipolar.
translation.es: Tengo TDAH, TOC, DBP, TID y soy bipolar.

translation.en: Um... you'd think some of those would cancel the others out, but...
translation.es: Uno pensaría que algunos de esos cancelarían a los otros, pero...

translation.en: I've been watching a lot of basketball lately,
and that's been helping a lot, so...
Not really sure why I'm here.
I guess it's 'cause I... I got in this fight at school and,
translation.es: Supongo que es porque me metí en una pelea en el colegio.

translation.en: I was there, but I wasn't there.
translation.es: Estaba ahí, pero no estaba ahí.

translation.en: I- I- I just get a little lost sometimes.
I don't know. Is that enough?

translation.es: Gracias. Me alegra que estés aquí.

translation.en: Amanda, why don't you go ahead?
I've tried to kill myself twice.
I think about it almost every day.
translation.es: Pienso en eso todos los días.

translation.en: Hey, have you heard anything yet?
I gotta go to work. I'm gonna be late. But you should stay.
translation.es: Debo ir a trabajar. Volveré tarde, pero tú deberías quedarte.

translation.en: Why does he keep doing this?
Have him call me when you hear from him, OK?
translation.es: Dile que me llame cuando hables con él.

translation.en: I heard you beat the shit outta Roamer.
translation.es: Oí que le diste una paliza a Roamer.

translation.en: Why do you keep doing stuff like that?
Aren't you tired of people talking about you all the time?
translation.es: ¿No estás cansado de que hablen de ti todo el tiempo?

translation.en: I don't know. I feel like I keep messing things up,
translation.es: No lo sé. Siento que sigo arruinando las cosas,

translation.en: and I'm not sure I know how to not do that.
translation.es: y no sé si sé cómo no hacer eso.

translation.en: Your girlfriend's pretty worried about you.
translation.es: Tu novia está muy preocupada por ti.

translation.en: She's been at the house all afternoon.
translation.es: Estuvo en la casa toda la tarde.

translation.en: good memories you have of him?
Well, the fact that he would beat the shit out of us
translation.es: El hecho de que nos golpeara

translation.en: kind of negated all the good times.
But why was he like that?
Was he like that because of us? Was he...
He was like that because he was a shitty person.
translation.es: Era así porque era una mala persona.

translation.en: There has to be a reason, though.
Because if there's a reason, then he could get better.
translation.es: Porque si hay una razón, entonces podría mejorar.

translation.en: someone could make him better, right?
I don't know. Who cares? Dude, he's someone else's problem.
translation.es: No lo sé. ¿A quién le importa? Es un problema ajeno.

translation.en: Why are you asking me about Dad?
Come on. You can talk to me, man.
Are you sure? Because I have to open the bar,
translation.es: ¿Seguro? Porque tengo que abrir el bar,

translation.en: - but I can find someone to cover me. - I'm good.
translation.es: - pero puedo pedir que me cubran. - Estoy bien.

translation.en: You know I love you, right, Theo?
I don't understand what that means.

translation.es: A veces me quedo en blanco.

translation.en: I... get into these dark moods.
I think too fast to keep track of anything,
translation.es: Pienso muy rápido y no mantengo el control.

translation.en: all my thoughts are gone at once.
translation.es: Todos mis pensamientos desaparecen al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: And sometimes, if I put 'em up there, I can...
translation.es: Y a veces, si los escribo,
puedo concentrarme y bajar la velocidad,

translation.en: I can't right now. I can't.
I can fix it. I just... I just need time to figure this out.
translation.es: Puedo arreglarlo. Solo necesito tiempo para pensar.

translation.en: - I'm trying to help you. - I don't need your help!
This is on me! This isn't about you!
translation.es: Es mi responsabilidad. No es sobre ti.

translation.en: You need to tell me what's wrong.
Hey, it's Finch. Leave a message.
translation.es: Hola, soy Finch. Deja un mensaje.

translation.en: I'm just sorry that I pushed.
just need you to come back.
I just really need you to come back, OK?
I found myself at the bridge.
I was standing on a ledge.
Well, I'm glad Finch was there.
translation.es: Me alegra que Finch estuviera allí.

translation.en: I just wish I knew where he was.
you two have been a lot of places.
translation.es: Ustedes dos han ido a muchos lugares.

translation.en: Is there any place else he might go?
translation.es: ¿Hay algún lugar al que pudo haber ido?
En nombre de la familia de Finch,

translation.en: I wanna thank you all for being here today.
translation.es: quiero agradecerles a todos por estar aquí hoy.

translation.en: We've gathered to celebrate and to honor the memory of one
translation.es: Nos hemos reunido para celebrar y honrar la memoria

translation.en: who will be incredibly missed because he has been so dearly loved.
translation.es: de alguien a quien extrañaremos mucho porque era muy querido.

translation.en: The events of these past few days...
translation.es: Los eventos de estos últimos días...

translation.en: Sorry that I wasn't there for you.
translation.es: Lamento no haber estado ahí para ti.

translation.en: I didn't know how to tell you.

translation.es: La Capilla de oración de los viajeros,

translation.en: for the weary travelers to stop and rest along their way.
translation.es: para que los viajeros cansados se detengan y descansen en su camino.

translation.en: It was built in memoriam to those
translation.es: Fue construida en memoria a aquellos

translation.en: who have lost their lives in auto accidents...
translation.es: que perdieron la vida en accidentes automovilísticos.

translation.en: and as a place for healing.
translation.es: Y como un lugar para sanar.

translation.en: We remember those who are no longer here,
translation.es: Recordamos a los que ya no están aquí,

translation.en: who were taken from us too soon,
translation.es: a los que se fueron demasiado pronto

translation.en: and who we will always keep in our hearts.
translation.es: y guardaremos siempre en nuestros corazones.

translation.en: I used to be worried about everything.
I worried about what would happen if I let myself feel again.
translation.es: Me preocupaba lo que pasaría si volvía a sentir.

translation.en: I thought I didn't deserve to.
I wasn't worried about what would happen if I lived.
translation.es: No estaba preocupada por lo que pasaría si viviera.

translation.en: I was worried about what would happen if I didn't.
translation.es: Me preocupaba lo que pasaría si no lo hacía.

translation.en: Not remembering all of the moments...
Because he taught me to wander.
translation.es: Porque él me enseñó a pasear.

translation.en: He taught me that you don't have to climb a mountain
translation.es: Me enseñó que no tienes que escalar una montaña

translation.en: to stand on top of the world.
translation.es: para estar en la cima del mundo.

translation.en: That even the ugliest of places can be beautiful,
translation.es: Que incluso los lugares más feos pueden ser hermosos,

translation.en: as long as you take the time to look.
translation.es: siempre y cuando te tomes el tiempo para mirar.

translation.en: That it's OK to get lost...
as long as you find your way back.
translation.es: siempre y cuando encuentres tu camino de regreso.

translation.en: But in learning all of that,
I missed seeing something more important...
translation.es: me perdí de ver algo más importante,

translation.en: I missed that he was in pain.
translation.es: TU TURNO Me perdí su dolor.

translation.en: I missed that he was teaching me all along
translation.es: Me perdí que me estaba enseñando

translation.en: He dreamt while he was awake.
He dreamt of all the beauty in the world, and he made it come to life.
translation.es: Soñó con toda la belleza del mundo y la hizo cobrar vida.

translation.en: Finch taught me that there's beauty in the most unexpected of places.
translation.es: Finch me enseñó que hay belleza en los lugares más inesperados.

translation.en: And that there are bright places,

translation.es: Y que si no los hay,

translation.en: you can be that bright place...
translation.es: tú puedes ser ese lugar brillante
